tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_data (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 date DATE NOT NULL,
 revenue DECIMAL,
 profit DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialData (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date DATE,
   revenue DECIMAL(15, 2),
   expenses DECIMAL(15, 2),
   profit DECIMAL(15, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE GrowthMetrics (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date DATE,
   revenue_growth DECIMAL(10, 2),
   user_growth INT,
   market_share DECIMAL(8, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_financial_data (
    date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL,
    profit DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_forecast (
    date DATE,
    forecasted_revenue DECIMAL,
    confidence_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE growth_trends (
    date DATE,
    growth_rate DECIMAL,
    trend_analysis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE market_analysis (
    date DATE,
    market_segment VARCHAR(50),
    competitive_analysis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE financial_metrics (
    date DATE,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value DECIMAL
)
